name: Delicious Ahi Fish Burgers with Chives
author: HAPALYSSA
summary: I got this recipe from my coworker - loved it and then made it for my boyfriend. Now he loves it and I make it at least twice a month. You can eat this plain or as a burger. I recommend eating them with hamburger buns, mayo, lettuce and onions.
ingredients: ⅓ cup panko crumbs  or breadcrumbs
freshly ground black pepper to taste
directions: In a large bowl, mix together tuna, carrot, onion, chives, eggs, panko crumbs, and mayonnaise
Season with garlic salt and black pepper
Heat oil in a skillet over medium heat
Arrange patties in the pan (only as many as will fit easily in the pan)
Cook, uncovered, 10 minutes per side, or until golden brown
